lead_paragraph: GROEL--Berdine, 80, of New Vernon, NJ, passed away peacefully at home on January 24, 2016. Berdine was predeceased by his beloved wife Susan. Berdine is survived by his daughter, Jennifer G. Beimfohr (Douglas); son, Frederick C. Groel (Pinelopi); grandchildren, Margaret, Emily, Katharine, Lucy, Maxwell and Christopher; and sister, Marjory Ward (James). A memorial service will be held at The First Presbyterian Church of New Vernon, 2 Lee's Hill Road, New Vernon, on Saturday, February 6th at 11am. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to The First Presbyterian Church of New Vernon or the Princeton Class of 1957 Classmate Fund, c/o Classmate Fund President, Sheppard H.C. Davis, Suite 1000, 401 Atlantic Avenue, Virginia Beach, VA 23451. Condolences for the family may be offered online: bradleyfuneralhomes.com. 1/3
